title: Tangy Tartar Sauce (Made With Dill Pickles, Not Sweet)
directions: Mix all ingredients together, and allow to stand (refrigerated) for at least an hour.
ingredients: 1⁄4 cup dill pickle, minced (or prepared dill pickle relish)
2 tablespoons pickle juice (if not using relish)
1 tablespoon sweet pickle relish (only if a little sweetness is preferred)
